description: This module gathers facts for a specific guest on VMWare vSphere. These facts include hardware and network related information useful for provisioning (e.g. macaddress, uuid).
This module requires the pysphere python module.
author: Dag Wieers
notes: This module ought to be run from a system that can access vSphere directly. Either by using C(local_action), or C(using delegate)_to.

examples.code:
local_action: vsphere_facts host=$esxserver login=$esxlogin password=$esxpassword guest=$inventory_hostname_short
only_if: "'$cmdb_hwmodel'.startswith('VMWare ')
examples.description: Task to gather facts from a vSphere cluster only if the system is a VMWare guest
